sec.div: Determination of Zeta Potential and Size
sec.p: The Zeta potential and size of the synthesized Ce-CMEO-NPs were enumerated by employing Zetasizer Nano-25 (Malvern Instruments) following the methodology of Liu and Gao (2009). The Ce-CMEO-NPs were dialyzed in a 12-kDa membrane against 0.03 M Tris buffer, pH 5.6 for 18 h.
